title: How to fix RADS ERROR!
body:
Go to Computer, press Local disc (C) and then open the map: Riot Games 

Then, open League of Legends -> RADS 

Open System -> System.cfg -> Open as Notepad (if already not)

It will look like this
DownloadPath = /releases/live
DownloadURL = l3cdn.riotgames.com
Region=EUNE

Now, delete that and paste in this: 
DownloadURL = l3cdn.riotgames.com
DownloadPath = /releases/live
Region=EUW


Save and now open league of legends, see if this will work :P

replies.body: I was playing yesterday when the RADs error hit. I changed my DNS and logged in fine.

I can't say that such a fix will help resolve this particular issue, but more commonly RADS errors are caused by OS Permissions Issues.  If you get this error, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104).  The steps there can be fairly simple, but they are crucial in hopefully resolving this issue.

I hope either of these solutions helps resolve the error!
